config.comments.allow_origins: The API service allows CORS sources list.
config.comments.allow_reload_base: Whether to allow reloading of the base modules.
config.comments.allow_request_private_ip: Whether to allow bot to request local private IP addresses. (Prevent possible leakage)
config.comments.auto_purge_crontab: Cron expression for automatic cache purge.
config.comments.base_superuser: The bot's base superuser list. The values ​​filled in here will be loaded into the database when the bot starts.
config.comments.browser_executable_path: The browser executable file path used by WebRender. If empty, the default browser installed by playwright is used.
config.comments.browser_type: The browser type used by WebRender. (Supports "chrome" and "firefox")
config.comments.check_access_key_id: The AccessKey ID of Alibaba Cloud Content Security Service.
config.comments.check_access_key_secret: The AccessKey Secret of Alibaba Cloud Content Security Service.
config.comments.check_use_textscan_v1: Whether to use Alibaba Cloud Content Security Text Scan 1.0 legacy API.
config.comments.command_prefix: Command prefix. The value filled in here will be recognized as the command prefix.
config.comments.config_version: Config version number, which will be automatically updated with the features and generally does not need to be modified.
config.comments.confirm_command: The keyword of the confirmation command. The value filled in here will be recognized as the confirmation command.
config.comments.db_path: Database connection string, use the connection string format supported by Tortoise ORM.
config.comments.debug: Whether to enable debug mode, more log information will be output when enabled.
config.comments.enable_analytics: Whether to enable built-in statistics features.
config.comments.enable_commit_url: Whether to show the commit URL when displaying version information.
config.comments.enable_dirty_check: Whether to enable text filtering detection, requires the AccessKey ID and AccessKey Secret of Alibaba Cloud Content Security Service.
config.comments.enable_https: Whether to enable HTTPS protocol security measures.
config.comments.enable_joke: Whether to enable the joke. It will occur at April 1st server time when enabled.
config.comments.enable_module_invalid_pr: Whether to enable the prompt message when the module does not exist.
config.comments.enable_petal: Whether to enable the petal feature.
config.comments.enable_rickroll: Whether rickroll the user when text filter detection fails.
config.comments.enable_tos: Whether to enable built-in ToS checking rules.
config.comments.enable_urlmanager: Whether to enable URLManager for URL springboard. (Declare this URL is not an official link, etc.)
config.comments.ff3_key: The key used to encrypt sensitive information. (Encrypted using the ff3 algorithm, which may be used in some scenarios)
config.comments.ff3_tweak: The key tweak used to encrypt sensitive information.
config.comments.heartbeat_attempt: The number of attempts to send heartbeat messages.
config.comments.heartbeat_interval: The interval for sending heartbeat messages.
config.comments.ignored_sender: Ignore user list. Users matching this list will be ignored.
config.comments.jwt_secret: The authentication key for the built-in API, for signing and verifying validity.
config.comments.login_max_attempt: Maximum number of login requests limit.
config.comments.matrix_device_name: Matrix bot device name, it can be filled in at will.
config.comments.matrix_user: Matrix bot fully restricted user ID.
config.comments.mention_required: Whether to force processing of only messages that mention the bot at the beginning of the message.
config.comments.no_confirm: Whether to execute the command without the sender confirming the message.
config.comments.petal_gained_limit: The maximum number of petals users can get per day.
config.comments.petal_lost_limit: The maximum number of petals users can lose per day.
config.comments.petal_sign_limit: The maximum number of petals users can get from signing in per day.
config.comments.petal_sign_rate: The probability of getting petals by signing in, ranging from 0 to 1, with an exponential decay in the number of petals obtained.
config.comments.qq_access_token: Access Token for connecting to the WebSocket server when using the Onebot protocol.
config.comments.qq_allow_approve_friend: Whether to automatically approve friend requests when using the Onebot protocol.
config.comments.qq_allow_approve_group_i: Whether to automatically accept group invitations when using the Onebot protocol.
config.comments.qq_bot_enable_send_url: Whether to enable sending URLs when using QQ official robot.
config.comments.qq_disable_temp_session: Whether to enable temp sessions when using the Onebot Protocol.
config.comments.qq_enable_listening_self: Whether to enable self-message monitoring when using the Onebot protocol.
config.comments.qq_host: The address of Aiocqhttp WebSocket main server. (The Onebot protocol end should use the reverse Websocket method to connect)
config.comments.qq_initiative_msg_cooldo: Limits the cooldown time in seconds for Aiocqhttp active messages to be sent.
config.comments.qq_limited_emoji: When using QQ related protocol terminals, the response emoji ID attached to the message when the message processing fails. It needs to be supported by the protocol terminal. For details of emoji ID, see: https://bot.q.qq.com/wiki/develop/api-v2/openapi/emoji/model.html#Emoji
config.comments.qq_private_bot: Whether it is a private robot when using the QQ official bot.
config.comments.qq_typing_emoji: When using QQ related protocol terminals, the response emoji ID attached to the message when processing the message. It needs to be supported by the protocol terminal. For details of emoji ID, see: https://bot.q.qq.com/wiki/develop/api-v2/openapi/emoji/model.html#Emoji
config.comments.quick_confirm: Whether to enable quick confirmation of message.
config.comments.remote_only: Whether to allow use the remote WebRender service only.
config.comments.remote_web_render_url: The URL of the remote WebRender service. Try the request if the local WebRender rendering fails.
config.comments.report_targets: Reporting session list, the value filled in here will be identified as the reporting session. (For example: when the bot executes a command error, the bot will send the error information to the corresponding session)
config.comments.rickroll_msg: Rickroll message when text filter check fails.
config.comments.shuffle_rate: The random occurrence rate of jokes, ranging from 0 to 1.
config.comments.slower_schedule: Whether to enable a slower scheduled task scheduler. (To reduce request pressure)
config.comments.tos_temp_ban_time: Temporary ban duration for ToS violations.
config.comments.tos_warning_counts: Maximum number of warnings for ToS violations.
config.comments.typo_check_args_score: The allowed similarity score for argument spelling check, ranging from 0 to 1.
config.comments.typo_check_command_score: The allowed similarity score for command spelling check, ranging from 0 to 1.
config.comments.typo_check_module_score: The allowed similarity score for module spelling check, ranging from 0 to 1.
config.comments.typo_check_options_score: The allowed similarity score for option spelling check, ranging from 0 to 1.
config.comments.use_font_mirror: Whether to use font mirrors when rendering web pages.
config.comments.use_secrets_random: Whether to use the random number generator based on the secrets library.
config.comments.web_host: The host address of the Web service. Setting to 0.0.0.0 will listen to all addresses.
config.comments.web_port: The port number of the Web service. Setting to 0 will disable the service.
config.header.line.2: NOTE: TOML is not like Python. Do not use Python syntax here.
config.header.line.3: EXAMPLE: Boolean values in TOML must be lowercase.
config.table.config: The basic config section. The value ​​filled in here can be displayed in the message. Please do not fill in sensitive information in this section.
config.table.config_bot: The basic config section of the platform. The value ​​filled in here can be displayed in the message. Please do not fill in sensitive information in this section.
config.table.config_module: The basic config section of the module. The value ​​filled in here can be displayed in the message. Please do not fill in sensitive information in this section.
config.table.config_webrender: The basic config section of WebRender. The value ​​filled in here can be displayed in the message. Please do not fill in sensitive information in this section.
config.table.secret: The secret config section. The bot will try to intercept if the value here accidentally appears in the message sent, but be careful to prevent leakage.
config.table.secret_bot: The secret config section of the platform. The bot will try to intercept if the value here accidentally appears in the message sent, but be careful to prevent leakage.
config.table.secret_module: The secret config section of the module. The bot will try to intercept if the value here accidentally appears in the message sent, but be careful to prevent leakage.
core.help.author: Author:
core.help.regex.note: This module supports regular expressions. The message will match with the following:
error.config.invalid: The config is invalid or not found. Please check the config file.
error.config.secret.not_found: The secret key is not found. Please check the config file.
error.config.webrender.invalid: No WebRender configured. This command cannot be used.
error.i18n.fallback: (If you see this placeholder, it means something we've messed up! Please send the issue back so that we can fix it in time.)
error.message.chain.empty: The bot attempted to send an empty message. Please contact the bot owner to resolve this issue.
error.message.chain.unsafe: The message contains insecure content and has been blocked.
error.message.discord.dm.cannot_send: This command does not support sending messages in private chat. Please contact the developer.
error.message.discord.thread.permission_: Unable to send message. Probably because the bot does not have sufficient permissions in this channel (to create a sub-channel).
error.message.limited: Failed to send message. The message might be blocked. Please try again later.
error.message.limited.msg2img: The message has been blocked. Try sending by image:
error.message.paused: Group message delivering was blocked by the server. Group message delivering is suspended. Use "${prefix}resume" to resume pushing.
error.message.prompt: An error occurred while executing the command:
error.message.prompt.external: This error may be caused by external systems. If the error occurs repeatedly, please report the following message to bot owner.
error.message.prompt.noreport: This error is not caused by the bot and thus should not be reported to bot owner.
error.message.prompt.report: Please report the following message to bot owner.
error.message.report: The following error occurred while executing "${command}":
error.message.timeout: Message sending timed out. Please retry the command later or wait for the result to be returned.
error.module.helpdoc_invalid: "${module}" module provided invalid help information. Please contact the developers to solve this issue.
error.module.unbound: "${module}" module is unbound with any commands and doesn't have the description. Please contact the developers to solve this issue.
game.message.running: This game is currently in progress.
game.message.stop.none: This game is not in progress.
loader.load.failed: The following error occurred during modules loading and module(s) with error were not loaded:
message.cooldown: You need to wait ${time} second(s) before executing this command again.
message.cooldown.manual: This session has been set to wait ${time} second(s) before executing the commands again.
message.embed.author: Author:
message.id.init.sender.confirm: This user does not exist. Initialize?
message.id.init.target.confirm: This session does not exist. Initialize?
message.id.invalid.sender: Invalid ID format. The format should be "${sender}|<User ID>".
message.id.invalid.target: Invalid ID format. The format should be "${target}|<session ID>".
message.reply.prompt: (Please quote to reply this message using the specified words)
message.wait.confirm.prompt: (Send a confirmation word such as "Yes" to confirm)
message.wait.confirm.prompt.qq: (Send a confirmation word such as "Yes", press emoji reactions or double-click the avatar to confirm)
message.wait.confirm.prompt.reaction: (Send a confirmation word such as "Yes" or press emoji reactions to confirm)
parser.admin.permission.denied.command: This command can only be used by the admins of the session. Please contact the admins to execute this command.
parser.admin.permission.denied.module: Commands under the "${module}" module can only be used by the admins of the session. Please contact the admins to execute the command.
parser.command.fixup.confirm:
Did you mean "${command}"?
(Command syntax corrections only, no guarantee of expected results)
parser.command.running.prompt: There are currently commands executing. Please try again later.
parser.command.running.prompt2: The previous command is being executed.
parser.module.disabled: "${module}" module is not enabled. Please contact the admins to enable this module.
parser.module.disabled.prompt: "${module}" module is not enabled. Please use "${prefix}enable ${module}" to enable this module.
parser.module.disabled.to_enable: Do you want to enable the module and continue executing this command?
parser.module.unloaded: "${module}"hasn't been loaded yet. Please contact the developers to solve this issue.
parser.superuser.permission.denied: You do not have permission to use this command.
petal.message.gained.limit: However, the daily limit of petals obtained today has been reached. Please try again tomorrow.
tos.message.appeal: For objections, please go to ${issue_url} and create an issue.
tos.message.banned: Your account has been blocked since the number of warnings you have triggered exceeds the maximum limit. Your request will be ignored after this message.
tos.message.in_group_blocklist: This group is in group blacklist, automatically left.
tos.message.reason.abuse: Too many command usages within a period of time.
tos.message.reason.cooldown: Too many usages of the same command within a period of time.
tos.message.reason.kick: Kick the bot from the group.
tos.message.reason.restrict: Imposing unfriendly restrictions on the bot.
tos.message.report: User ${sender} triggered an abuse warning in session ${target}.
tos.message.tempbanned:
Note:
We have temporarily banned you because your action triggered a warning.
${ban_time} second(s) remaining until unban.
tos.message.tempbanned.warning:
Note:
Although the temporary ban was triggered, using commands still may cause you to be warned again.
${ban_time} second(s) remaining until unban.
tos.message.warning:
Warning:
You have violated our Code of Conduct according to our Terms of Service.
tos.message.warning.prompt: Your account will be blocked if you receive more than ${warn_counts} warnings.
